#summary Release note

= Release Note =

== 1.0.2 ==
  * Canonicalized charset names which are returned by !UniversalDetector.getDetectedCharset().
  * All charset names which juniversalchardet can detect are now defined in org.mozilla.universalchardet.Constatants. They can be compared to the result of !UniversalDetector.getDetectedCharset().

== 1.0.1 ==
  * Fixed an array bound violation in ISO2022JPSMModel. Thanks, Kazutoshi Satoda.

== 1.0 ==
  * Initial release.
